Html:
Hi,

I have read the developer's guide to Prism 4, but the documentation seems not quite detailed while talking about the usage of region adapters and region behaviors.

Is there any further samples, readings or documentations that cover the usage of region adapters and behaviors for deeper understanding?

Thanks!
Have a look at the prism library source. You can check out the default regionadapters already created for. Exmple ContentControlRegionAdapter, TabControlRegionAdapter etc..
